OOC: Well, I was waiting for Airly to past dammage for my non lethal blow,
but I will continue this post. Also Kinger, sorry I didnt post blindness
earlier, I didnt know it was directed at every body.

BIC:
Menasor , still looking at his prisoner, notices a small grenade land. Then
it erupts in a wave of light, hitting Menasor's optics. "Menasor....cant
seee" he screamed in a childish rage, still holding Condor tightly, he
swung his free hand around, trying to ward off light (im not saying it will
work, just Menasor is stupid) he then starts to fire random burst from his
plasma blaster on that arm, to all over the field of battle. "What happen
to Menasor, What Happen?"
